text: Emile Davenport Hirsch (born March 13, 1985) is an American television, voice and movie actor. He is known for his role as Speed Racer in Speed Racer and as Matthew Kiddman in The Girl Next Door. Hirsh was born on March 13, 1985 in Topanga, California. He was raised in Los Angeles, California. He studied at Alexander Hamilton High School. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Emile Hirsch
